db:abstract.db:para: Provides a Qt Quick item that represents a WaylandView.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Qt Quick-based Wayland compositors can use this type to display a client's contents on an output device. It passes user input to the client.

db:section.db:title: bufferLocked : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the item's buffer is currently locked. As long as the buffer is locked, it will not be released and returned to the client.
The default is false.

db:section.db:title: compositor : WaylandCompositor
db:section.db:para: This property holds the compositor for the surface rendered by this WaylandQuickItem.

db:section.db:title: focusOnClick : bool
db:section.db:para: This property specifies whether the WaylandQuickItem should take focus when it is clicked or touched.
The default is true.

db:section.db:title: origin : enum
db:section.db:para: This property holds the origin of the QWaylandQuickItem.

db:section.db:title: paintEnabled : bool
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the item is hidden, though the texture is still updated. As opposed to hiding the item by setting visible to false, setting this property to false will not prevent mouse or keyboard input from reaching item.

db:section.db:title: sizeFollowsSurface : bool
db:section.db:para: This property specifies whether the size of the item should always match the size of its surface.
The default is true.

db:section.db:title: subsurfaceHandler : object
db:section.db:para: This property provides a way to override the default subsurface behavior.
By default, Qt will create a new SurfaceItem as a child of this item, and maintain the correct position.
To override the default, assign a handler object to this property. The handler should implement a handleSubsurfaceAdded(WaylandSurface) function.
The default value of this property is null.

db:section.db:title: surface : WaylandSurface
db:section.db:para: This property holds the surface rendered by this WaylandQuickItem.

db:section.db:title: void surfaceDestroyed()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the client has destroyed the wl_surface associated with the WaylandQuickItem. The handler for this signal is expected to either destroy the WaylandQuickItem immediately or start a close animation and then destroy the Item.
If an animation is started, bufferLocked should be set to ensure the item keeps its content until the animation finishes

db:section.db:title: [since 5.13] point mapFromSurface(point point)
db:section.db:para: Maps the given point in the Wayland surfaces's coordinate system to the equivalent point within this item's coordinate system, and returns the mapped coordinate.
This method was introduced in Qt 5.13.

db:section.db:title: point mapToSurface(point point)
db:section.db:para: Maps the given point in this item's coordinate system to the equivalent point within the Wayland surface's coordinate system, and returns the mapped coordinate.

db:section.db:title: setPrimary()
db:section.db:para: Makes this WaylandQuickItem the primary view for the surface.
